channel.title: About the Organizing OGM category
channel.description: How should we organize ourselves? What roles should we define? Should we have guilds? If so, which? If not, how else to organize along interest or skill lines?

item.title: About the Organizing OGM category
item.dc:creator: Tony
item.description:
Jerry:

I am creating activity diagrams of OGM. (I have talked with Peter K)

I have heard (somewhere) that the high-level goal of OGM is to solve major global problems. Is this correct?

If correct, has it been agreed upon that System Thinking is the approach?

Tony Markatos

Read full topic

item.description:
How should we organize ourselves? What roles should we define? Should we have guilds? If so, which? If not, how else to organize along interest or skill lines?
